system_vocabulary.definition: A modular part of the system that performs a specific function.
system_vocabulary.example: The API Gateway is a component.

system_vocabulary.definition: A connection or dependency between two components or entities.
system_vocabulary.example: The API Gateway connects to the KnowledgeGraphDB.

system_vocabulary.definition: A set of permissions and responsibilities assigned to a user or process.
system_vocabulary.example: The Administrator role has full access.

system_vocabulary.definition: A logged event that records when and how a seed file was loaded or updated.
system_vocabulary.example: A seed event was created when core_config.json was loaded.

system_vocabulary.definition: The order in which system blocks or tasks should be processed.
system_vocabulary.example: Core configuration has the highest priority.
